description: This script sets up a testing environment for different machine learning models, including creating virtual environments, installing dependencies, and running model-specific tests within a project. It includes functions for printing messages, validation of environment variables, and conditional logic based on the model name.

methods.name: print_heading
methods.description: Prints a formatted heading message to the console.

methods.name: print_info
methods.description: Prints informational messages to the console.
